programme.title: Deranged
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman races against time to save his family when they start to exhibit symptoms of a fatal outbreak that had been causing an epidemic of drownings.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other’s backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.title: The Mimic
programme.desc: A woman searching for her missing son takes in a girl she finds near Mt. Jang. They encounter a mysterious creature known as "Jangsanbum" - it imitates human voices and lures children to eat them.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: The Swordsman
programme.desc: Joseon’s greatest swordsman went hiding after the fall of King Gwanghae. When his daughter is taken hostage by a Qing envoy, he has no choice but to raise his sword again to rescue her.

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Welcome To The Guesthouse
programme.desc: A university student who keeps failing at securing a job stumbles upon a guesthouse by the beach. With no other options, he begs for a job there and discovers surfing.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Detective K: Secret Of Virtuous Widow
programme.desc: Joseon's top detective investigates a series of mysterious murders plaguing the country, uncovering disturbing secrets that link the murders to a massive conspiracy that will shake the whole nation.

programme.title: Mr. Housewife
programme.desc: A dad enjoys his daily chores and taking care of his daughter at home. But when he faces financial trouble, he joins a TV game show to win the jackpot while pretending to be a housewife.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Ji Min witnesses a hit-and-run and starts confusing reality and fantasy. She becomes a suspect of the hit-and-run along with Woo Ri, with a policeman chasing their every move named In Tae.

programme.title: My Perfect Roommate
programme.desc: Living with strangers becomes even more challenging when it comes to 70-year-old lady and young college boy.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Deranged
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman races against time to save his family when they start to exhibit symptoms of a fatal outbreak that had been causing an epidemic of drownings.

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: On Your Wedding Day
programme.desc: A bittersweet love story that chronicles a couple who met in high school and their relationship over the course of 10 years.

programme.title: Mal-Mo-E: The Secret Mission
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation in the 1940s, two men work together to secretly create a dictionary of the Korean language when the language was banned.

programme.title: Marrying The Mafia 2: Enemy In Law
programme.desc: When In-Jae, the eldest son of a mafia family meets the beautiful Jin-Kyung, his mother is more than pleased but when they find out she is a prosecutor, it brings chaos to their family.

programme.title: Papa
programme.desc: A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other’s backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Former U.S.-raised arm-wrestling champion returns to South Korea for a tournament to return him to glory, but he finds his life complicated by the appearance of the biological family he never knew.

programme.title: Pipeline
programme.desc: A team of experts were put together to drill into Korea’s oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another…

programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective 2: In Action
programme.desc: A homicide detective and a comic book storekeeper recruit an online private eye to launch a full-fledged investigation on a murder case.

programme.title: Come Rain, Come Shine
programme.desc: On their last day together, a married couple is still unable to articulate their true feelings for each other and linger on their relationship.

programme.title: Mental Coach Jegal Ep2
programme.desc: Jegal Gil, a Taekwondo athlete who is permanently expelled from the national team due to an accident, returns to the athlete’s village and becomes a mental coach to help players in slump.

programme.title: Talent Ep3
programme.desc: This is a talent reality show gathering different talents to perform under various themes. Nicholas Tse, G.E.M., Meng Fei, and Annie Yi are invited to explore the outstanding talents and stories from their professional knowledge and perspectives.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2020) Ep11
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. They will have conversation with the female guests through the "second scene". All guests by two-way choice get to decide if they are the right persons to couple up.

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 2 (Repackaged) Ep9
programme.desc: Wu Qi Long, Song Yi, Wang Yao Qing, Guo Jun Chen, and Dong Si Chen are invited to serve as the members of Star Chaser, letting go the trivialities and troubles of daily life and recalling the sincere and touching relationship under the starry sky. Let’s share the sense of healing in the trip!

programme.title: New Chinese Dating Event Season 2 Ep2
programme.desc: A blind date program hosted by Meng Fei. Participants will join a blind date with their parents, to explore the topics of love and marriage. The difference of value of marriage between two generations will be shown.

programme.title: We Are In Love 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Three celebrity couples and people couples join together, uniting love and transmit positive energy.

programme.title: Go Ahead Ep176
programme.desc: Large outdoor water flushing program, from the all corners assembled from the thousands of contestants, in Shenzhen Happy Valley launched a speed and passion competition! As long as you are on the way, hit all levels of the hand icon, you can win double prizes.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Season 3 Ep15
programme.desc: A dating program designed for singles or divorced people who have passed the age of marriage. 4 male guests and 3 female guests would join the one-to-one communication in sequence per episode. The guests who are under the stage would be arranged to a room, to communicate more and deepen their understanding with each other. Love never comes late!

programme.title: Tour With Classics – A Poetic Journey In China Ep16
programme.desc: Taking the poetry and geography as a clue, the program explores the poetic landscapes, traditional buildings, and humanity depicted in the Chinese classic poems. Let’s take the poetry as a window to understand China.

programme.title: Tour With Classics – A Musical Journey In China Ep16
programme.desc: Let’s use the music to interpret travel and use the travel to annotate music. This is a musical journey to lead the audience appreciating the mountains and rivers in China, and feeling the humanistic stories and spirits behind the music.

programme.title: Share Life Ep14
programme.desc: Focusing on the life of the youngsters with Shanghai as the story background, six guests of different ages, occupations and genders would “share life” for 105 days because of various reasons. programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep731732
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3469
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44584459
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep733734
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1744
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) (Repeat) Ep71
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep20

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep2829
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep413
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Hello Again! (M) Ep2324
programme.desc: Just 100 days left until the college entrance examination. Chang Ke-Ai, a top student, and Yang Zih-Hao, a renowned prankster, the twelve-graders make a wager in school one day after a squabble. In a twist of fate, the wager turns out to alter the courses of their lives.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) (Repeat) Ep112
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep735736
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep636
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep414
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Piggy's Counter-Attack (M) Ep3435
programme.desc: A rich father, who built his fortune from nothing, goes bankrupt overnight when his investments fail. His children are knocked out of heaven and have to launch a counterattack.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene!

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following “The Way We Are”, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a town nearby are at stake. A retired soldier and his son, step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Jack, a renowned archaeology professor, and his team are on a quest to locate a lost ancient Indian treasure. They find a diamond key unlocking the treasure, but it is snatched by a team of mercenaries. Jack leads his team to India and Dubai to beat the mercenaries to the treasure.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every client’s needs. When Ah Kam’s ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: Kung Fu Jungle
programme.desc: A vicious killer goes around challenging and killing top refined martial arts masters. When convicted killer and kung fu expert Hahou Mo hears of this, he offers to help the police capture the killer in exchange for his freedom. Can he really help?

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Chasing The Dragon
programme.desc: The epic story behind the founding of the People’s Liberation Army in China that ultimately laid the foundation for a new republic, featuring a star-studded cast of Chinese actors including Liu Ye, Zhu Yawen, and more!

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boy’s marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation. While searching for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of the tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer money while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army’s help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: After killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk, Wu Song is appointed as chief constable. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang seduces Wu Song but gets rejected and later engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang after he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother’s death, Wu Song kills the two of them.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master’s rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao’s betrayal…

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor'S Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao (Chen Chia-chi) is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun (Wang Jung), the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi (Chao Kuo) - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang (Liu Yung) to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern – an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all…

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Come Drink With Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow” is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar “Drunken Cat” who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kong’s entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: Martial Arts Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers’ death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire’s Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by Jin Yong, havoc breaks out when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, training manual, treasure map & a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: Return Of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ruthless ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dong clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun Fei Yang masters the silkworm martial arts style and takes revenge on Wu Di. Unfortunately, Yun is defeated and seriously hurt, so Master Li Bu Yi brings him to treatment while the ninjas pursue Yun relentlessly.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: The subtle repackage of the most filmed Ching Dynasty novel, The Dream Of The Red Chamber by renowned director Li Han-hsiang has earned public acclaim by attaining The Best Art Direction of The 15th Golden Horse Award, The Best Costume and The Best Art Direction Of The 24th Asian Film Festival. Brigitte Lin and Sylvia Chang play the adorable yet sorrowful couple Bao Yu and Dai Yu; playing their roles to the hilt in this gloomy love story of their uncontrollable destinies.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries the young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this “young” auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Ode To Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu Chia-hui, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: The Cave Of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother’s Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang (Ho Fan) is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey (Chou Lung Chang), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun) have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Duel Of The Century
programme.desc: In the mid-1980's Chu Yuan became internationally famous for starring as the nasty villain in Jackie Chan's groundbreaking worldwide hit, POLICE STORY. But for more than twenty-five years, he was famous as one of Hong Kong’s most respected directors of "Martial-art World" epics — often conceived by his remarkable collaborator, novelist Ku Lung. This was one of their last together for the Shaw Brothers Studio, but it's another revenge and mystery-tinged winner. Liu Yung and Sun Chien (the Korean kicking THE FIVE VENOM from Chang Cheh's internationally popular series) team to investigate the martial-art murders of a supposedly mortally wounded swordsman, only to find deception, double-dealings, imposters, and one deadly duel after another. No less than three choreographers are on hand to handle the multitude of martial arts, making this one of Chu Yuan's most involving and exciting efforts ever.

programme.title: The Lady Is The Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: In The Sword And The Lute, Kwei Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) and his partner (Chin Ping) are on a mission to destroy the "Phoenix Lute", a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles up to 500 paces and which can only be destroyed by the Kan curved sword...

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies…

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: New Tales Of The Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan (Chang Chan-peng) is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai (Alexander Fu Sheng). The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific (Nat Chen Pai-chiang). Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou (Wang Yu).

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: An actress has information on a crime syndicate and assassins are sent after her. Ricky and Swordflower are to stay undercover at the actress’ house to capture the assassins. When three assassins eventually turn up at a recreation building, Muscle and Ricky arrive in the nick of time for the showdown.

programme.title: Vyjayanthi Ips
programme.desc: Vyjayanthi is a police officer who is dedicated to her work. When she arrests a young man who was involved in a sexual assault case, his father vows to kill her.

programme.title: Enakku Innoru Per Irukku
programme.desc: Johnny, a simple man, is in love with Hema, whose father, Dass, is a gangster looking for his successor. But in order to marry Hema, he must become a gangster and help Dass eliminate his enemies.

programme.title: Veterivel
programme.desc: In a bid to help his younger brother unite with the girl he loves, Vetrivel and his friends decide to kidnap her. Things take an ugly turn when their plan goes wrong and results in messy situations.

programme.title: Enna Solla Pogiraai
programme.desc: Vikram, a young man, plans to make his fiancee fall in love with him. However, when his plan backfires, he finds himself embroiled in a love triangle.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Rowdy Boys
programme.desc: Kavya, a medical student, and Akshay, an engineering student, begin to fall for each other. However, an ugly gang war between their respective colleges impacts their love story.

programme.title: Chennai Palani Mars
programme.desc: An aspiring scientist and a musician, who are cocaine-addicts, attempt to travel to Mars with the help of a scientifically unstable concept.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Endrendrum Punnagai
programme.desc: Goutham grows up hating women after his mother abandons him during his childhood. Though he decides to stay single while his friends marry, Priya changes his mind about singlehood.

programme.title: Seeru
programme.desc: A guy from a small-town takes on a ruthless criminal lawyer for his friend and sister

programme.title: Kadaisi Nodigal (Forensic)
programme.desc: When a psychotic murderer sets out on a killing spree, a medico-legal advisor uses his forensic skills to unravel the truth behind the heinous deeds.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Nerkonda Paarvai
programme.desc: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

programme.title: Dhiya (Karu)
programme.desc: When Thulasi gets pregnant before marriage, she is forced to abort the baby. Years later, her unborn baby's spirit kills all those who forced her mother to undergo an abortion.

programme.title: Sillu Karupatti
programme.desc: An anthology of four romantic stories revolving around people of different age groups where the only true thing binding them all together is love.

programme.title: Irandam Ulagaporin Kadaisi Gundu
programme.desc: A lorry driver ends up in possession of an unexploded bomb that is being sought after by both the cops and pro-peace activists.

programme.title: Kolamaavu Kokila
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Sethupathi
programme.desc: Sethupathi, a tough police officer, investigates the murder of an inspector. His findings lead to the arrest of Vathiyar, an influential man in Madurai, but put his life, career and family at risk.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: The Priest
programme.desc: Father Carmen, a priest, joins hands with the police to investigate a series of mysterious suicides. However, he soon stumbles upon a disturbing fact that has serious consequences.

programme.title: Naan Sirithal
programme.desc: Gandhi, who suffers from Pseudobulbar, finds his life turned upside down when he gets in trouble with Dilli Babu, a gangster.

programme.title: India Pakistan
programme.desc: Two aspiring lawyers, Karthick and Mellina, not knowing that both are of the same profession, share an office due to financial problems. Things take a turn when they work on the same case.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep50
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

Logan stumbles onto Veronica's detailed computer files of everyone connected to Lilly's death. Never before has a date in history been so significant to so many cultures, so many religions, scientists, and governments. Centuries ago, the Mayans left us their calendar, with a clear end date and all that it implies. Since then, astrologists have discovered it, numerologists have found patterns that predict it, geologists say the earth is overdue for it, and even government scientists cannot deny the cataclysm of epic proportions that awaits the earth in 2012. A prophecy that began with the Mayans has now been well-chronicled, discussed, taken apart and examined. By 2012, we’ll know – we were warned.

programme.title: After School Club Ep539
programme.desc: After School Club is the Live Music Request show for K-Pop fans all around the world. On our weekly live show, you can join our video chat sessions through Google Hangouts, send us tweets, and share status. Also, ASC presents the K-POP stars' record storehouse! The ASC Archive will be a compilation of the deep conservations about the guests' albums, the diverse requests they carry out, as well as TMIs from behind-the-scenes.

programme.title: Diplomat Talks Ep100
programme.desc: Diplomats residing in South Korea have prepared special stories to share and have extended their invitations to viewers around the world. Through in-depth conversations with ambassadors who are at the center of global discussions, viewers can learn about near, but far neighboring countries, as well as the rest of the multicultural nations co-existing on our planet. "Diplomat Talks" will be sharing stories from ambassadors, never been told before, with its viewers around the world.

programme.title: Unboxing K-Life Ep15
programme.desc: Unboxing K-Life is an informational guide for the global audience and consumers who are lost in the vast world of shopping. This program gives direct and realistic reviews of ground-breaking products made by Korean SMEs. The program provides a foothold for Korean SMEs to go global and our international viewers and consumers can receive shopping tips through reviews of excellent Korean items which they are curious about. Learn about an assortment of products like household goods, beauty products, and even Korean food.

programme.title: What Is Ep9
programme.desc: <What is> provides viewers with intimate coverage of the latest and hottest issues making headlines in Korea through the eyes of the producers in charge and a wide variety of different outside perspectives. <What is> poses important, thought-provoking questions about various subjects, people, and phenomena, providing viewers with accurate information and issues to contemplate over through in-depth reporting and expert analysis from the leading minds in their respective fields.

programme.title: Arirang News [Live] Ep1
programme.desc: International news especially focusing on the issues of the Korean peninsula/South North Asia.

programme.title: Wow Lucky Box Ep2
programme.desc: Wow! Lucky Box delivers a gift of carefully selected made-in-Korea products that are going global based on their outstanding quality and smart designs. We visit the production companies to get in-depth information on the technology and development of their products and analyze the products from global consumers’ perspectives.

programme.title: Premium Collection B Ep13
programme.desc: Arirang TV's premium documentary series, Premium Collection

programme.title: Premium Collection B Ep14
programme.desc: Arirang TV's premium documentary series, Premium Collection

programme.title: Catchy Korea Ep127
programme.desc: The center of the Korean Wave, where you can learn Korea’s sophisticated culture. CATCHY KOREA, a comprehensive cultural content in “Omnibus format”. The whole world keeps its eyes on what happens in Korea! We bring you a fresh take on Korea’s up-and-coming events, fascinating culinary, culture, and festival scenes. Now it’s the era where culture and art are also enjoyed by streaming! Time for little chit-chats with rising stars in culture and art fields! Let’s take a close peep in their personal and honest stories.

programme.title: Never A Dull Moment Ep6
programme.desc: Never a moment to be bored! Never a moment to rest! Filled with brilliant and shining moments of stars, a program that’ll make you into a fan!

programme.title: Live On Trot Ep40
programme.desc: Live.On, a music festival held every day, featuring musicians of various genres. Giving life to small pop music bands and concert venues! Giving joy to those who love music! Live.On, also a live concert you’ll look forward to every day. Enjoy from the comfort of your home!

programme.title: Gangnam Insider's Picks 4 Ep22
programme.desc: Gangnam is a district with various cultures. What’s the first thing you want to do when you get a chance to visit Gangnam? You can enjoy the Korean traditional culture through traditional music and Hanbok. You can also enjoy the trendy modern culture through K-Pop and the wedding dress tour. Everything is possible in Gangnam, so create some unforgettable memories through your visit.

programme.title: Travel Track: Travel Ep9
programme.desc: Travel Track, a series of honest-to-goodness, self-guided trips in Korea’s hidden travel destinations! Four individuals with fantastic chemistry form a team to experience and introduce each destination’s local experiences, cuisine, and attractions!

programme.title: Walking The Americas Ep2

programme.title: Walking The Americas Ep3
programme.desc: Episode three joins Levison on the edge of a string volcanoes set amidst stunning landscapes and beautiful colonial cities of Nicaragua, before he crosses into the natural paradise of Costa Rica.

programme.title: Walking The Americas Ep4
programme.desc: Episode four finds Levison on the final leg of his journey in Panama: home to the most dangerous stretch of jungle on Earth – the Darien Gap – which Levison must cross to reach Colombia.

programme.title: A Knight's Tale

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Interior Ep3
programme.desc: Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.desc: The Florida Keys is the first line of defence for the southern US. With a rich naval history and a coastal lifestyle, it’s easy to believe locals who claim these waters are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboons of Bambelela Ep4
programme.desc: With power in numbers, adaptability and intelligent leadership, the Bambelela baboon troop is an excellent example of why baboons thrive throughout Africa. Their highly refined social behavior and organization mirror much of human society and show just how alike we are to our primate cousins.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Eyes Ep4
programme.desc: Why do zebras have stripes? How do penguins see underwater? And why are a tree frog’s eyes red? In this exploration of sight, discover how some animals have evolved to see extremely well while others have evolved to be nearly invisible.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Social Animals Ep5
programme.desc: Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Ancient Lineages Ep6
programme.desc: Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Isimangoliso Ep3
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as “the Miracle”, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Rhythm of the Bay Ep1
programme.desc: The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North America’s largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere. The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Yukon Wild Ep2
programme.desc: The Yukon is a true wilderness, one of the last on Earth. The vast land got its name from its longest river, which the Gwich’in, one of the indigenous people of the region, call "Yu-kun- ah", or, the "great river". The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3,000 km Northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Waiting for Winter Ep3
programme.desc: It’s November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. But the ice - which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now - is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record. In late November, the temperature is 10 degrees warmer than its average. Climate change is wreaking havoc across the North. At just below zero degrees Celsius, the sea cannot freeze.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Creature Comforts Ep5
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Social Animals Ep5
programme.desc: Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Rhythm of the Bay Ep1
programme.desc: The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North America’s largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere. The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Ancient Lineages Ep6
programme.desc: Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5

programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Isle Royale Ep1
programme.desc: Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country. We go with lead researcher Rolf Peterson as he gets a band of volunteers to scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Invaders from the Deep Ep2
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Karoo Ep4
programme.desc: In the center of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now it’s a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 - Emerald Season Ep1
programme.desc: It’s the end of November in the Luangwa Valley, and the rains have just begun. It marks the end of one of the toughest dry season on record, and triggers a transition from parched wilderness to luscious wetland.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 - After the Rains Ep2
programme.desc: As the dry season takes hold in Zambia's Luangwa Valley, lagoons will start to dry-up and verdant grasslands will gradually turn to dust. Animals must make the most of the wet season’s legacy whilst they can.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 - Dying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: South Luangwa National Park is one of Africa’s great wild places. Lying at the southern tip of Africa’s Great Rift Valley, its extraordinary mosaic of habitats supports a rich diversity of life. The fortune of every animal that lives here is inextricably linked to the two vastly different seasons they experience – the wet and the dry.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Land of Extremes Ep1
programme.desc: This episode visually illustrates how the Arctic, locked in darkness for nearly seven months, springs to life once the sun rises above the horizon. We explore ideas of migration, hibernation, the food web and habitat change, and are introduced to some of the Arctic’s most magnificent and iconic creatures and its most dramatic landscapes.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat 1 - Joey's Journey Ep2
programme.desc: Wombats are solitary, slow-moving creatures, but breeding time brings out their energy, aggression and lots of play. Meet a southern hairy-nosed wombat named Birri, who’s trying to find a mate, along with a female named Winnie and her joey, Fred.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep29
programme.desc: Flynt - Ty gets jealous when a Hydrodon named Flynt becomes everyone's new hero, but when a blazing fire heads towards the ravine, Ty must ask Flynt for help

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep15
programme.desc: A New York Minute - Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep29
programme.desc: Citizen Brain / Lair Liar Pods On Fire - The Big Brain Boov recruit Oh to join them; Oh is introduced to the concept of "harmless lying," and lies so much that he is unable to distinguish between fact and fiction

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep15
programme.desc: Cyrano - Brian downloads some sketchy software that promises to make him cool. It works out great and everyone’s happy! (JK, it’s a huge disaster.)

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck'S Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep22
programme.desc: House Of The Future / Dr. Buttersocks - Loy upgrades the house with a few seemingly helpful robotic enhancements. Archibald becomes a sock-puppet wrestling superstar.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Boo To You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Escape From Azka-Bash - Dennis must escape detention and Bash Street School to make the Beanotown Brawny Bean Race before Walter wins it! With the help of a note placed in his desk, he must sneak past Mrs Creecher and make a run for it – unless the mysterious note giver stops him first!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Griller Thriller - Dennis’ ultimate hero, Grizzly Griller, plans on trekking to the source of the River Beano, broadcasting the treacherous path on live TV. Dennis introduces him to his pet hamster, Galahad – only to discover they are his biggest fear! Grizzly is so torn up that Dennis must disguise himself as his hero and go in his place!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep55
programme.desc: Caballo Sin Cabeza - When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep3
programme.desc: Enter The Fanaloka - The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep74
programme.desc: Race To The Finish Part 1 - The girls get summer jobs to help Lucky repair the sprawling house she inherited from her grandfather near the Rosemead Valley Racetrack.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that it’s time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Horrible Hostilities Of The Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Who'S A Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade Of The Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep55
programme.desc: Something Rotten On Beserker Island - When the riders receive an invitation to Berserker Island for Gustav's apprenticeship graduation, they arrive to find Savage trying to take over Dagur's throne

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep5
programme.desc: The First Picture Show - When Thunk invents the first-ever movie using shadow puppets, everyone in Ahhh! Valley loves it...until they are shocked by the ending.

programme.title: 3 Below: Tales Of Arcadia Ep19
programme.desc: There'S Something About Gwen (Of Gorbon) - Two royal teenage aliens and their bodyguard flee a surprise takeover of their home planet by an evil dictator and crash land in Arcadia. Now on the run from intergalactic bounty hunters, they struggle to blend in and adapt to the bizarre world of high school all the while attempting to repair their ship so they can return and defend their home planet.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Richie Rich And The Tapir Of Doom / Dollar Dollar Saves Y'All - Tiny and Lucretia sign on as sidekicks in Richie's search for a legendary treasure. Dollar's desperate to prove he's the Best Good Boy.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Rupert And The Sleepy Flowers - RUPERT wants to play with RAGGETY. But Raggety has to work - MOTHER NATURE needs him to plant seedlings. Rupert decides to make Raggety's life easier, and discovers Ping Pong has some magic seeds for flowers that grow really easily, no watering or pruning required. Rupert and Raggety scatter these seeds across Nutwood, head off to have fun. But the flowers turn out to be Snoozeflowers: their perfume sends everyone to sleep. Rupert's plan for Raggety doing less work has backfired – Nutwood is going to become a place where nothing's done at all, because everyone's sleeping. Luckily, it's revealed that rain will wash the snooze away, and Rupert takes Raggety up to the top of the lighthouse so he can make rainstorms, rescue Nutwood from sleepiness. They get down to gardening together!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magical Puppets - Rupert and his friends have fun making puppet versions of themselves. They are amazed when the puppets appear to come alive and run away, forcing the friends to pursue them all over Nutwood.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep45
programme.desc: Liam And The Kid'S Big Day Out - When Liam announces he's babysitting Bubba Johnson, Sandra bets he won't last the day. Liam accepts the bet, adding that if he wins, she has to go to the movies with him. Will Liam manage to get the upper hand with the 7-year-old delinquent or will he become another Cosmos High teen destroyed by Bubba?

programme.title: My Life Me Ep46
programme.desc: Cut Out The Sarcasm - Sandra takes up the challenge to quit being sarcastic for an entire week. But the bet doesn't get really interesting until each of the podmates takes up a challenge pertaining to his or her own character faults. Soon the foursome is working to undermine each others' efforts in order to win the bet.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep97
programme.desc: My Fair Bumble - Bumble has been asked to Aunt Tulip's for tea but he is worried that his manners are not up to scratch. He asks the other tots to help him out.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep98
programme.desc: Pineapple Palace Panic - Fifi is supposed to be babysitting Grubby, but she's forgotten! Stingo and Slugsy step in to cover for her, with disastrous results!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Bmxcess - JJ’s so keen to get Dennis the new bike she thinks he’s desperate to have, that she gets caught up in a “you scratch my back” predicament with Walter, surreptitiously feeding him security information that could lead to a jelly-blasting rampage.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Pieface Day - Pieface Day Pieface inadvertently rescues Walter and Bertie from peril with Ralf and a rogue digger! Dennis leads the town in celebrating Pieface Day but doesn't listen when Pieface tries to tell him its all one big misunderstanding! Walter uncovers the truth; proclaims himself a way bigger hero; and launches a massive ego-fest called Walter Week – from which Pieface eventually rescues him properly, in true hero style.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep75
programme.desc: Knights Of Light, Part 2 - Inside Honerva’s mindspace the Paladins battle against foe’s new and old. An unexpected group of allies assists in revealing Honerva’s plan.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep25
programme.desc: I Knew That Was Gonna Happen/Sacagawea - After hearing a prediction that the world will end during the show, Sherman panics and Peabody must take control of the apocalypse situation

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep23
programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep47
programme.desc: Best Frenemies/The Jamaican Jerk Chickens - Skidmark gets jealous when White Shadow and Turbo become best friends; the crew must race as a bobsled team against the favored Jamaican Chickens.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Gran Up - When Gran’s Harley gets impounded, Dennis thinks she’s lost her groove and given up on her thrill-seeking ways. In trying to help her, Dennis accidentally ages himself up into an Old Man Dennis, who teams up with Gran to prove you’re never too old to be a rebel.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep42
programme.desc: The Tech Specs - Dennis is in the frame for a crime he didn’t commit, and Mrs Creecher’s new super-powered Tech Specs mean she can suddenly see WAY too well: she teams up with Sergeant Slipper to track down “fugitive Dennis” who has to somehow evade the all-seeing Tech Specs so he can prove his innocence and reveal the true criminal.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep21
programme.desc: It'S On Like Amazon! - Wally and Wenda go on a mission to return the borrowed Quick Bloom Key to its owner, an Amazon-dwelling wizard named Vinebeard. But Odlulu intercepts the key so she can use its magic for her lemonade stand. Using local trails, Wally and Wenda must track Odlulu through the jungle. They'll have to raft the Amazon and brave Odlulu's ""living"" plants to complete their mission

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep13
programme.desc: Podlings / Dumpster Dining - Oh's family reunion ends up turning into a disastrous family Tip and Oh secretly turn Lucy's craft store into a trendy new Boovian restaurant.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep15
programme.desc: Hair-Jitsu / Crushin' It - Branch must learn the importance of patience when Poppy teaches him "hair-jitsu"/Smidge tones down her forceful Smidge-ness when she forms a crush on the village critter-narian

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep16
programme.desc: Meet The Peppy / Party Crash Course - When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep41
programme.desc: In Dreams - When Puss asks the second witch sister Malaranea for her gem, she casts a spell that makes him a prisoner in his dreams and only Dulcinea can save him

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep42
programme.desc: Fluteus Maximus - When Puss approaches the third witch sister Maliflua, he discovers she is actually the Piper and that a fourth witch is much closer than ever imagined

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep41
programme.desc: The Neverending Clover - After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep42
programme.desc: Who Arted? - King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep15
programme.desc: Night Of The Hunters Pt 1 - When Stormfly is captured by a new enemy, Ryker Grimborn, and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup, Toothless and the team must rescue her before it's too late

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep16
programme.desc: Night Of The Hunters Pt 2 - As Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the others from Ryker and the Dragon Hunters, they don't realize Dagur and Heather are working with the enemy

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep41
programme.desc: Arcadia'S Most Wanted - To stop the crime wave that has been hitting Arcadia, the Trollhunters must search for a missing Troll.

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep42
programme.desc: Bad Coffee - When Strickler tempts Jim to use dark magic in his training, it hits the school faculty in an unexpected way!

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep15
programme.desc: Tip'S Deep Dish / Garbage Day - When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep16
programme.desc: Very Foreign Exchange Student / Pig'S Tail - Tip's new friend, the Roidian, stays with the Tuccis in hopes of learning from humans; Tip accidentally swaps bodies with Pig.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep15
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Two - A video of Rocky and Bullwinkle playing a song goes viral and they’re rocketed to musical superstardom. They decide to use their newfound celebrity to launch a “save the birdbath” concert tour to restore the giant birdbath they destroyed.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep16
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Three - Rocky, Bullwinkle, Boris and Natasha are kidnapped by a super-fan named Francis, the eight-year-old heir to the Puffy Platypus Pizza franchise, to play a private concert for his birthday.

programme.desc: Ladies Night - Khepra, leader of the Cat Council, takes Cleo, Akila and Callie on a "Ladies' Night Out" at the arcade. Cleo hates it until Khepra picks a fight with some aliens. Then at least there's kicking.
