programme.desc: Meet The Peppy / Party Crash Course - When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep41
programme.desc: In Dreams - When Puss asks the second witch sister Malaranea for her gem, she casts a spell that makes him a prisoner in his dreams and only Dulcinea can save him

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep42
programme.desc: Fluteus Maximus - When Puss approaches the third witch sister Maliflua, he discovers she is actually the Piper and that a fourth witch is much closer than ever imagined

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Scare Bud / All Harvey'S Eve - There's an uninvited guest at the Bow's house: a not-so-scary ghost named Casper. On Halloween, Lotta tries to win a spooky storytelling contest.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Rupert And The Beehive - During a big thunderstorm in Nutwood, the swarm of bees lose their home. Bill badger attempts to reconstruct their hive with the help of his tool box but unfortunately it falls to pieces. With another thunderstorm looming, will the bees get a new home in time?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Rupert And The Lost Bird - Rupert is off to join his friends in the wood, where he learns that Raggety has just heard the most extraordinary bird-song - from presumably an unusual bird. What is it doing in Nutwood? Bill learns that many birds migrate from the Far South to spend the summer in the Far Far North. The unusual visitor must have been doing so but got lost and cut off from its flock. Rupert determines that they should help the lost bird on its way. Thanks to Ming and Rupert's car, they are finally able to do so...

programme.title: My Life Me Ep47
programme.desc: Family Tree - Birch's romantic fate with Raffi takes one-step forward and another TWO backwards! It seems Birch and Liam might be related to Raffi. Sandra factors into the fray when it becomes obvious that her new work-study job at City Hall is essential to setting the record straight.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep48
programme.desc: Just Say Nooo - Raffi, in a fit of people pleasing, becomes the “go to guy” for everyone one who needs a favour on the same day. Soon he's spread thinner than a steamrolled pancake and no one's getting the help they need — especially his own podmates.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep99
programme.desc: Poppy'S Big Race - It is the day of the annual Flowertot Race. Poppy is reluctant to enter as she always loses her way. Fifi and Bumble help her train for the big race, but will she win?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep100
programme.desc: Blueberry Hunt - Fifi and Bumble are off to pick all the ripe blueberries off the bush. But when they get there all the berries have disappeared. Who could have taken them?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger Hidden Yeti - The gang’s efforts to help JJ master the ancient martial art of Blamjitsu are thwarted by Walter’s plans to capture the Beanotown Yeti – whom they all think is a Blamjitsu Master, and guardian of the mystical Gloop of Greatness. Dennis and the gang defend the Yeti, and help JJ unleash her Inner Blam, in a gravity-defying martial arts face-off with the WilburCorp Henchbot.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Double Crust - Crusty the Robot Pie Spy has been hacked by Doctor Pfooflepfeffer and is sending her photos of Screwtop’s latest inventions so she can claim them as her own. The gang expose her scheme by getting Crusty to “leak” blueprints of the most terrible inventions they can think of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Blue's Big Neighborhood Adventure - Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Meteor Mayhem / Dance Of Destruction - A meteor is heading for earth and Sir Steel's heroic efforts only make the Deer Squad's job in saving the planet even harder! // A dance competition in the Central Forest turns chaotic when Sir Steel uses his monkey suit to beat Rammy in the final.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIngertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooter - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington and The Bad Swap - Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S6 Ep613
programme.desc: Race to the Golden Gift - Blaze is joined by all of his friends in the Race to the Golden Gift! But to win, they'll first have to get past Crusher and his fresh batch of cheats.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon - Santi and crew go underwater to stop Escarlata la Pirata before she steals all the Magic Rubies from Giant Clam Reef! // It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Teensy the Tardigrade - Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep511
programme.desc: Snow Squad to the Rescue! - When someone's stealing sleeping bags from campers, Gil is convinced a yeti is to blame! Will the Snow Squad catch the culprit?

programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep103

programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals

programme.desc: It's YOUR Birthday - It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a very special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party! As we celebrate, we play games and gather prizes for a pinata!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Melon Festival / Pups Save A Cow - Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Fan Club / Speeding Steel - After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.desc: The Two of Clubs / Vacation Daze - Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together. // When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

programme.desc: Always Yes Annie / Sleepover - Pony bets Annie that she can't go a whole day without saying no. // Annie is determined to go to her first sleepover, but Pony's homesickness threatens to change that.

programme.desc: Give 'Em A Hand / Natural Habitat - Billy and Maddy join a kid's citywide obstacle course with the help of the stunt team. // Gabby Tocamera hosts a documentary about the green city and the mysterious disappearance of the beloved sewer dolphins.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Cubs and Robbers / Billy the Bug - A movie promotion stunt goes wrong, unleashing a humongus 'Cubby the Cop' balloon on the city. // Fire Chief McCloud accidently buys a malfunctioning Twirly Hat for her nephew.

programme.desc: Taken - The boy's imaginations run wild when Dave disappears. When they finally find him, they're convinced he's a zombie.

programme.desc: The Curse of MacBeth - The Chipmunks don't want to perform in the school play, after learning of its curse.

programme.desc: Zeela The Great - Simon's robot Geizmo becomes jealous of Jeanette's robot Zeela, until a sudden tragedy reveals Geizmo's true heart.

programme.desc: Davey Boy - Alvin gets a taste of his own medicine when he zaps Dave with a youth ray, turning him into an irresponsible teen.

programme.desc: The Krabby Patty That Ate Bikini Bottom / Bubble Buddy Returns - Mr. Krabs uses Sandy's experimental growth formula on a Krabby Patty and the results are disastrous! // While Bubble Buddy's son, Shiny, is visiting, SpongeBob tries desperately to keep him out of trouble and away from sharp edges.

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Bilsky's Billions - When Mitch Bilsky enrolls at SWAG, Headmaster Ray and Danger Force use a combination of patience and powers to help him achieve the impossible and graduate high school.

programme.desc: Codzillard - When Viv wishes her bestie Courtney to visit from Oldsburg, Courtney urges Viv to move back. Roy pulls out all the stops to keep that from happening and brings the girls' favorite monster Codzilla to life.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Guess Who's Shopping for Dinner? / New Roomie - Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.desc: Wheel and Deal / Feast or Family - Lana wants to win a race car ride-along with her hero, so she and Lincoln enter to compete in a soap box derby. // When Luan must enroll in a culinary class, Dad uses it to share his passion for cooking with one of his kids.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Terror Firma - Marooned on a deadly planet, the crew must work together with their captive Gwyn to stay alive.... except the planet isn't the only thing in pursuit.

programme.desc: Karen 2.0 / InSpongeiac - When Plankton replaces his computer wife Karen with the new, better Karen 2, the original Karen ends up working at the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob can’t get to sleep, and asks for help from Patrick… who can’t stay awake.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep172
programme.desc: Face Freeze! / Glove World R.I.P. - SpongeBob and Patrick make a bet to see who can hold a "funny face" the longest...then their faces freeze that way! // SpongeBob and Patrick spend one last glorious - and dangerous - day at Glove World before it closes for good.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: Global Watch

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. programme.desc: Kibarkan Jalur Gemilang - Dokumentari bersiri Negaraku: Teguh Bersama dengan siri kedua bertajuk Kibarkan Jalur Gemilang memaparkan detik-detik indah yang dirasai warga Malaysia ketika melihat bendera kebanggaan negara dikibarkan di kejohanan sukan terutamanya. Jalur Gemilang…kita sanjung, Bahasa Kebangsaan…kita junjung dan lagu Negaraku…kita hormati, sesungguhnya menjadikan kita warga Malaysia yang terbaik untuk kemakmuran dan pembangunan negara kita, Malaysia. Siapa lagi kalau bukan kita? Selamat Hari Kebangsaaan 2022 Malaysia!

programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Dean tries to help a spiralling Justin after he lashes out at Ziggy. Irene gets a taste of the slick new homicide detective. Roo supports Kieran after his shock admission.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep157
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Leah makes a breakthrough with Justin. Christian diagnoses Jasmine's injury. Kieran makes a huge step forward in his recovery.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep154
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Ziggy continues to support Justin against her own better judgement. The new detective has started rattling a few cages. Justin continues to find new ways to reach rock bottom. Stephen continues to be there for Leah.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep155
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Ari and Mia take Chloe home. Jasmine wakes up. Rachel finally gets her brace off. Justin wakes out of his reverie.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep156
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Jasmine's memory is on reset. Christian struggles with the tragic death of his patient. Mia's concerned with what Jasmine will say about the pregnancy.

programme.title: National Press Club Address Ep33
programme.desc: Robyn Denholm, leading global technology executive, Chair of the Board of Directors of Tesla Inc, Operating Partner of Blackbird Ventures and Chair of The Technology Council of Australia, addresses the Press Club.

programme.title: Landline Ep31
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep35
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters across the country uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep38
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an intelligent and engaging mix of news, updated information, in-depth analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Fauziah Ibrahim and Dan Bourchier plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: Insiders Ep34
programme.desc: David Speers and the panel discuss the latest in politics as the PM goes to London for the Funeral of Queen Elizabeth II and to meet King Charles III. Plus a Public Holiday declared on Sept 22 and parliament to return early.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep37
programme.desc: Kelli Underwood and the panel discuss the AFL Preliminary Finals between the Cats v Lions and Swans v Magpies, NRL Semis between the Eels v Raiders and Sharks v Rabbitohs, AFLW, NRLW and Bledisloe Cup: Wallabies v All Blacks.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep16
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Tiana Penitani, Sam Wykes and former Kumuls captain David Mead cover the first round of NRL finals. Cook Islander Kayal Iro talks about his family heritage in the NRL and PNG athlete Jeconiah Peni on his pathway to the AFL.

programme.title: ABC News Ep76
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep33
programme.desc: With cost of living pressures and interest rates rising after the pandemic, it's never been more important to keep an eye on your money. Rachel Pupazzoni and the team explain the economic impact for business and consumers.

programme.title: AFLW Ep22
programme.desc: A Sunday tripleheader of AFLW begins with the Collingwood Magpies hosting the Adelaide Crows in Round 4 at Victoria Park.

programme.title: AFLW Ep23
programme.desc: Essendon host Richmond in Round 4 of the AFLW.

programme.title: AFLW Ep24
programme.desc: Round 4 of the AFLW concludes with Melbourne hosting the Brisbane Lions at Casey Fields in Melbourne.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep76
programme.desc: Gemma Veness presents the latest from ABC News, covering today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and updated news from all corners of Australia and around the globe.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep23
programme.desc: A few months ago, Sri Lankan protestors had a moment of triumph, storming the presidential palace and occupying its grounds. Now a new president is cracking down, putting many in jail. We ask, will the movement surrender?

programme.title: ABC News Sunday Ep38
programme.desc: A complete round-up of today's top stories, the latest news and the issues that matter to you. ABC News Sunday brings together the best reporting from across the nation and extended special reports. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: The Communicator
programme.desc: Bekti Andari is the 'rice winner' for her family in Indonesia, she is involved in an experimental dengue reduction programme. Her job is to be a communicator between the scientist and the community.

programme.title: First On The Ground
programme.desc: Australian peacekeepers have been in the field every year since 1947, when they were the first on the ground in the Netherlands East Indies. They serve with the aim of contributing to lasting peace around the world.

programme.title: Movin' To The Country Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - In Tasmania Kristy meets a couple of mates who harvest timber from drowned forest. In Derby, Halina goes on a mountain biking adventure. Craig meets entrepreneurs making the ancient Chinese spirit baijiu a best-selling drink.

programme.title: Who Gets To Stay In Australia? Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - For the first time, cameras record a hearing inside Australia's Appeals Tribunal as a Peruvian man fights for his life. Meanwhile, a wealthy English family faces deportation.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Australia's Oceans Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The Pacific Ocean occupies a third of the globe's surface. Aaron Pedersen explores the astounding diversity of this ocean from its depths to its surface, its temperate waters and equatorial regions.

programme.title: Art Works Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - We head to the National Indigenous Art Triennial in Canberra, this year titled Ceremony. Then we meet artist and film photographer Sammy Hawker, and get the lowdown on the latest in film and TV from critic Keva York.

programme.title: Jimmy Shu's Taste of the Territory Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Jimmy is in the Darwin CBD. He tells us as Darwin continues to become more cosmopolitan, the city's dynamic food scene continues to grow. He tells us this last episode is a celebration of the best of the taste of the Top End.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep76
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Landline Ep32
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.desc: Cardboard girl Danko, her friend Danta, and craft master Mr. Snips team up to make toys out of cardboard. In this episode, they make a robot version of her friend Danta!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Four Seasons In Japan
programme.desc: Ringed by reeds, Fukushimagata Lagoon has nearly 60 islands of various sizes. In May, Oriental reed warblers arrive from Southeast Asia, their boisterous song signaling the start of a new life cycle.

programme.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life(2)
programme.desc: The top 3 geisha idol celebrities in Edo: Tomimoto Toyohina, Takashima Ohisa, and Naniwaya Kita. See how Kitagawa Utamaro, the master of female beauty has illustrated them so differently.

programme.title: NHK World Selection
programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: Bosai:Disaster Response Robots
programme.desc: When disaster strikes, it can be hard to find people trapped under rubble, while fire, volcanic eruption, or nuclear accidents may bar entry entirely. That's where disaster response robots can help.

programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking, we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "Today's Just Barely!"...

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs. Song
programme.desc: Prelims - As two of the top fighters in the UFC’s most stacked weight class, Cory Sandhagen and Song Yadong haveproven worthy of their elite status, but on September 18, only one of these bantamweights will emergevictorious in the pivotal five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of stirringknockout wins over Marlon Moraes and Frankie Edgar that skyrocketed him into the 135-pound title picture,Sandhagen is determined to get another shot at the belt, and the first order of business is beating China’sSong, an explosive force who has already dfeated the likes of Moraes, Marlon Vera and Julio Arce.

South African prospect Dricus du Plessis details his country’s rich sporting history, and what it means to represent them on MMA’s biggest stage. And welterweight “Khaos” Williams brings us back to his UFC Debut at UFC 247
